metadata.metaValue: Construct a strands object to draw the two segments we start with, and a 3rd segment representing the shortest path between the two segments, then set render settings and color.
Construct a point object to draw the two points which are closest from each other's segments, then set render settings and color.

We get the segment ratios defining where on each segments
is the closest location to the opposite segment.
We use the ratios to get the closest position along each segments.
Finds the shortest path between two segments using ratios.
